items.content_html: Meet is an app that displays tech events hosted in a variety of cities. Users are able to filter their results by city and number of events. Built using TDD and BDD methodologies by using jest, cucumber and puppeteer. The backend is serverless, hosted on AWS Lambda and connected to the Google Calendar API. Frontend uses React.js.
items.title: charangautam/meet: Meet is an app that displays tech events hosted in a variety of cities. Users are able to filter their results by city and number of events. Built using TDD and BDD methodologies by using jest, cucumber and puppeteer. The backend is serverless, hosted on AWS Lambda and connected to the Google Calendar API. Frontend uses React.js.
